summary.span: 提供所有管理查询对象的抽象基类。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class for all management query objects.

span.span: Returns a copy of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void ParseQuery(string query) cil managed

span.span: The query string to be parsed.

summary.span: 分析查询字符串并相应地设置属性值。

span.span: Parses the query string and sets the property values accordingly.

summary.span: 如果查询有效，将分析查询的类名属性和条件属性。

span.span: If the query is valid, the class name property and condition property of the query will be parsed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例将查询分析到类名称和条件属性。The following example parses a query into class name and condition properties. [!code-csharp[wminet_ManagementQuery_ParseQuery#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementQuery_ParseQuery/cs/ManagementQuery_ParseQuery.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ManagementQuery_ParseQuery#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementQuery_ParseQuery/vb/ManagementQuery.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string QueryLanguage { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property QueryLanguage As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ QueryLanguage { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置查询字符串中使用的查询语言，该语言定义查询字符串的格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the query language used in the query string, defining the format of the query string.

value.span: 返回一个 值，该值包含查询字符串的格式。

span.span: Returns a value containing the format of the query string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 属性值Property Value 可以设置为任何支持的查询语言。Can be set to any supported query language. "WQL"是唯一的 WMI 本质上支持的值。"WQL" is the only value supported intrinsically by WMI. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string QueryString { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property QueryString As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ QueryString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 以文本格式获取或设置查询。

span.span: Gets or sets the query in text format.

value.span: 返回一个包含查询的 值。

span.span: Returns a value containing the query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 属性值Property Value 如果查询对象使用无参数构造的该属性为 null 直到专门设置。If the query object is constructed with no parameters, the property is null until specifically set. 如果对象使用指定的查询构造的该属性将返回指定的查询字符串。If the object was constructed with a specified query, the property returns the specified query string. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
